descr: Tell us more about your company. We need to understand from the very beginning how the project will fit into the existing model.
Who will use the site? Please, describe your most preferred customer.
Why do you think people will come to your site?
Does your company have unique features, products? (consumer qualities, range, price, terms of a transaction, warranty and service, geography, or something else)
Please, describe what you intend to receive (customer number database, bring traffic to the site so that more people know about the product or redirects visitors to the main site)
Should the website be optimized for a certain resolution or browser and mobile version?
Please provide us with a list of your main competitors.
Please show examples of websites that you like.
How long do you think the project should take? Describe the roadmap of your project.
Did you have a website before? Please give your current website address.
Do you have your own style or design options? Do you have your own logo?
Could you provide content (text, images) or could we create it from scratch?
What services should be integrated with the page? (if necessary, online chat or call back. Using these services, you can interact with visitors and sell more.
How do you plan to track page traffic?
